content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Route lets you bypass this workflow, rolling back from stage to dev or pushing a page from draft straight to live. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can schedule to push content live at a specific time, within the properties panel.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Scheduled changes are set to transfer from a previous stage to live. Choose the required time and date, click save and then save the page too. A clock will show in the file browser in status.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can also schedule the retirement of pages related to time sensitive campaigns too.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":65112,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e351517f-06af-49dd-9d8b-e44b8ac2f85b/Picture28.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e351517f-06af-49dd-9d8b-e44b8ac2f85b/Picture28.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture28.png\",\"name\":\"Picture28.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e351517f-06af-49dd-9d8b-e44b8ac2f85b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":235,\"height\":561},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An important note, an asset with the same name cannot exist within the same folder, it must be clearly identifiable. Once we have pushed our page live, we can create a branch of that page by right clicking it in the content tree and then selecting ‘branch’. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Branching creates an exact copy of the asset and shows a purple brace indicating a parent/child relationship. The new branch starts in draft mode regardless of the parent’s current state. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This draft view, or branch, of the page is where we can make edits to it in other modes including dev mode so the live page is remains unaffected.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":71271,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b3978730-7f42-4b3e-8a50-a85b3843662e/Picture30.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b3978730-7f42-4b3e-8a50-a85b3843662e/Picture30.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture30.png\",\"name\":\"Picture30.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b3978730-7f42-4b3e-8a50-a85b3843662e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":297,\"height\":664},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is now time to push the changes live. We can go through the draft page and go through the stages of publishing live. The branches ensure that our changes are not just pushed straight to live, they go to the branch where we make the changes. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once we have published our changes live, the branch will disappear as there is no difference between the branches of the page. However, the now-defunct page still exists and is accessible by clicking the option at the bottom of the content tree, ‘active’.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you want to create another page from the live or stage pages, you can choose which branch from. When you re-deploy to a state higher, it doesn’t override changes at states below if there are branches at a lower level. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For example, you have a live page with the same page at dev, pending and stage level. Branching the live page creates a new draft page duplicate. When you edit this new page and push it to dev level, it overwrites the live page previously at that level and nothing higher. If you need to edit the live page before the new updated page goes live, then re-publishing that live page DOESN’T update all levels below it as normal, and only applies to the live level page instead, due to the branch. You can have multiple duplicate pages as drafts and then a different version at each deployment level if this fits your working process.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":26758,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7fd5da79-4e15-4af6-9397-c3846adaf2fd/Picture31.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7fd5da79-4e15-4af6-9397-c3846adaf2fd/Picture31.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture31.png\",\"name\":\"Picture31.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7fd5da79-4e15-4af6-9397-c3846adaf2fd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":720,\"height\":99},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Multiple branches have the same name as they share the same URL. So, there is no way to tag pages to differentiate between separate campaigns/updates without going into each individually and comparing changes.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can clone an asset if you don’t want to change much between assets, by right clicking the chosen asset or going to the edit tab above the content tree and selecting ‘clone’.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":110313,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0ac6086d-f484-4c70-8a27-543a5551045a/Picture32.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0ac6086d-f484-4c70-8a27-543a5551045a/Picture32.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture32.png\",\"name\":\"Picture32.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0ac6086d-f484-4c70-8a27-543a5551045a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":508,\"height\":639},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Another way to create new assets is to select ‘copy’. This is most useful for taking an asset from one location to another. It can be done by once again right clicking the asset and selecting copy. Once we find our chosen location for the copied asset, we simply select ‘paste’ from the edit menu to place it there.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":87053,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1c42b579-62c6-41bf-aacc-a8c622e41bac/Picture33.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1c42b579-62c6-41bf-aacc-a8c622e41bac/Picture33.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture33.png\",\"name\":\"Picture33.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1c42b579-62c6-41bf-aacc-a8c622e41bac\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":508,\"height\":529},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
